original_text: And the robbers who were crucified with him also reviled him in the same way.
korean_text: 함께 십자가에 못 박힌 강도들도 이와 같이 욕하더라

sentences.original_text: And the robbers who were crucified with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 십자가에 못 박힌 강도들은

sentences.original_text: also reviled him in the same way.
